desc: Unique hand made luxury textiles. Hand woven, dyed, painted, stitched or wrought scarves, shawls, earrings, pendants, bags, wall hangings and any other fiber yummy obsession I add to my repertoire. In the last decades I have narrowed my interest to all things fiber and ways to combine those elements.

layout.text:
Unique Hand Woven, Dyed, Painted,
Stitched, and Wrought
Luxurious Textiles & Fiber Art
